title: Muesli
description: The best thing about making your own muesli is that you can make it exactly how you like it. So feel free to adapt accordingly.

default: milk, yoghurt or fruit juice, to serve

steps: Mix the oats, dried apricots, dried prunes, pumpkin seeds and sunflower seeds together and spoon into a serving bowl.
To serve, scatter over a handful of fresh berry fruits and pour over the milk, yoghurt or fruit juice.
